member.name: IAppxEncryptedPackageWriter.AddPayloadFileEncrypted
member.summary: Adds a new encrypted payload file to the appx package.
member.param: The name of the payload file. The file name path must be relative to the root of the package.
The type of compression to use to store fileName in the package.
An providing the contents of fileName. The stream must support , , and .
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptedPackageWriter.Close
member.summary: Closes and finalizes the written package stream.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptedPackageWriter
member.summary: Provides a write-only object model for encrypted app packages.
